reviews.review: buen juego, solo que gente muy mrd

Stands the test of time, and a long future to go. Worth practicing to get better, compared to other similar titles that generally focus on very different mechanics. CS:GO hits that sweet spot of always-conscious aim movement mixed with mechanical knowledge. You all know why CS:GO is great, but here's another number to add emphasis :P
